common.framework.dsb.service

接口 ServiceContext

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultServiceContext

    public interface ServiceContext
    Service context
    作者:
    David Yuan

      Get all service bean deployment information

      void loadConfigProperties(java.lang.String propertyFile)
      Load configuration properties file from the given properties file
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA), before calling this method, dsb.ha.server must be configured into system properties.
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String haName)
      Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA), before calling this method, haName must be configured into system properties. example: dsb.ha1=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Lookup dynamic service from the given service name

      T      		 lookup(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String host, int port)
      Lookup remote dynamic service from the given host and port
      void setProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      add one property to property list.

      • lookup

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup(java.lang.String serviceName)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup dynamic service from the given service name
        参数:
        serviceName - the name of service
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • lookup

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                  java.lang.String host,
                                  int port)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup remote dynamic service from the given host and port
        参数:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        host - the host address of the server
        port - the port of the server
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • lookup_ha

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                     java.lang.String haName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA), before calling this method, haName must be configured into system properties. example: dsb.ha1=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
        参数:
        serviceName -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • lookup_ha

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA), before calling this method, dsb.ha.server must be configured into system properties. example: -Ddsb.ha.server=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
        参数:
        serviceName -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        抛出:
